DOC.brief_summary: 1 . Written informed consent must obtain study specific procedure undertaken . 2 . The process experiment ( brief describe ) The patient must come back follow 4 12 week start new therapy . The investigator follow patient ' lipid profile side effect stop observation till 36 month start new therapy . The serum level HIV-VL , CD4 , GOT , GPT , triglyceride , cholesterol , HDL-cholesterol , LDL-cholesterol check every 3 month . The patient ' chart data delinked protect patient ' right privacy .
DOC.brief_title: Management Highly Active Anti-retroviral Therapy-related Hyperlipidemia Among HIV-infected Patients Taiwan
DOC.criteria: HIVinfected patient receive HAART therapy metabolic side effect . Age 20 year old Abnormal liver function : GOT GPT 5 time normal upper limit
